custom-block.l: Ask Google or Microsoft what they see.

custom-block.s: Broadcast speech recognition results and report any errors %b

block-definition.s: Listen to the microphone $nl %'handle response' when recognition completes $nl but if error %'handle error' with error message
block-definition.comment: Listens to the microphone for speech. The first script is run with the recognized text unless an error is encountered then the second script is called with text describing the error.

block-definition.s: Current image property from %'cloud provider' $nl with %'property name or names' property names
block-definition.comment: Reports a property of the most recent recognition by the AI cloud provider. Visit tinyurl.com/vision-snap to learn more.
Reports a list of tags from IBM Watson from the last time it was asked to recognize an image.

custom-block.s: Current image property from %txt %br with %mult%txt property names

block-definition.comment: Reports the tags from the last image recognition by Google.

custom-block.s: Current image property from %txt %br with %mult%txt property names

block-definition.comment: Reports the tags of the last image recognition by Microsoft.

custom-block.s: Current image property from %txt %br with %mult%txt property names

block-definition.s: Broadcast speech recognition results and report any errors %'report'
block-definition.comment: When something is spoken this broadcasts 'heard something' and sets 'last thing spoken' to the text that was spoken. You will need to create two new variables for this to work: 'last thing spoken' and 'speech recognition error'. Optionally reports errors. The 'stop speech recognition' block will stop the listening as will silence that triggers a 'no-speech' error.

custom-block.s: Listen to the microphone %br %cmdRing when recognition completes %br but if error %cmdRing with error message
Broadcast speech recognition results and report any errors %b

block.l: I didn't hear anything for a while. Bye. Click the green flag to start listening again.

list.l: . Click the green flag to try again.

block-definition.s: Speak %'message' then %'to do when finished speaking'

block-definition.comment: Use the browser's default voice or Mary TTS to speak the 'message'.

block-definition.s: Setup camera %'width' %'height' then when ready %'do when camera is ready'
block-definition.comment: Specifies the resolution of the image sent for recogntion.
Returns only after eCraft2Learn library is loaded
Should only be called by Load eCraft2Learn library

block.l: if (typeof ecraft2learn === 'object') { return true; } if (window.waiting_for_ecraft2learn_library) { return false; } window.waiting_for_ecraft2learn_library = true; let script = document.createElement("script"); script.type = "text/javascript"; if (window.location.hostname === 'localhost') { script.src = window.location.protocol + "//" + window.location.host + "/ai/ecraft2learn-beta.js"; // notice this the beta version } else { script.src = "https://ecraft2learn.github.io/ai/ecraft2learn.js"; } document.head.appendChild(script); return false;

if (typeof ecraft2learn === 'object') { return ecraft2learn.run(function_name, parameters); } if (!no_warning) { alert("Any eCraft2Learn command must be run before the " + function_name + " reporter."); } return 0;

custom-block.comment: Check if already ready to avoid the 1 second wait

block.comment: Wait a bit more because otherwise a black image is captured.

block-definition.s: Ask %'cloud provider' to say what it sees then %'then receive response' and show the picture %'show photo?'
Do %'handle response' with what Google sees and show the photo %'show'

custom-block.s: Ask %txt to say what it sees then %cmdRing and show the picture %s

custom-block.comment: Picks out the labels from the information returned from Google.
No labels so get the error message.

custom-block.l: Google did not report labels or an error.

custom-block.comment: There should be a 'tags' entry in the response.

block-definition.s: Open this in a new tab

block.l: if (typeof ecraft2learn === 'object') { ecraft2learn.run(function_name, parameters); } else { var script = document.createElement("script"); script.type = "text/javascript"; script.addEventListener('error', function () { alert("Unable to load https://ecraft2learn.github.io/ai/ecraft2learn.js. Check your network connection."); }); script.src = "https://ecraft2learn.github.io/ai/ecraft2learn.js"; script.addEventListener('load', function () { ecraft2learn.run(function_name, parameters); }); document.head.appendChild(script); }

block-definition.comment: Will display 'message' in a dialog box with 'title'. User needs to click 'OK' to remove it.
